Description_lang: Continuously deal ${$155166s2*$<CAP>/$AP} Frost damage every $t1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $303753s1 $lRune:Runes; at the start and end.|r
AuraDescription_lang: Continuously dealing Frost damage every $t1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you.

description_blz.en_US:
Continuously deal 609 Frost damage every 1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Generates 2 Runes at the start and end.
description_blz.es_MX:
Inflige continuamente 607 p. de daño de escarcha cada 1 s a los enemigos en un cono frente a ti, hasta que tu poder rúnico se agota. Inflige menos daño a los objetivos secundarios.

Genera 2 runas al principio y al final.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Causa 603 de dano de Gelo continuamente a cada 1 s aos inimigos em uma área cônica à sua frente, até seu Poder Rúnico se exaurir. Causa dano reduzido aos alvos secundários.

Gera 2 Runas no início e no fim.
description_blz.de_DE:
Fügt Gegnern in einem kegelförmigen Bereich vor Euch kontinuierlich alle 1 Sek. 604 Frostschaden zu, bis Eure Runenmacht aufgebraucht ist. Sekundärziele erleiden weniger Schaden.

Erzeugt jeweils 2 Runen zu Beginn und Ende des Fähigkeitseinsatzes.
description_blz.en_GB:
Continuously deal 597 Frost damage every 1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Generates 2 Runes at the start and end.
description_blz.es_ES:
Inflige continuamente 609 p. de daño de Escarcha cada 1 s a los enemigos en un cono frente a ti hasta que tu poder rúnico se agote. Inflige daño reducido a los objetivos secundarios.

Genera 2 runas al principio y al final.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Vous infligez en continu 610 points de dégâts de Givre toutes les 1 s aux ennemis dans un cône devant vous, jusqu’à ce que votre puissance runique soit épuisée. Inflige des dégâts réduits aux cibles secondaires.

Génère 2 runes au début et à la fin.
description_blz.it_IT:
Infligge costantemente 611 danni da gelo ogni 1 s ai nemici in un cono frontale, finché la potenza runica non si esaurisce. Infligge danni ridotti ai bersagli secondari.

Genera 2 rune all'inizio e al termine.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Непрерывно наносит противникам в секторе перед вами 598 ед. урона от магии льда раз в 1 сек. Действует до тех пор, пока не закончится сила рун. Второстепенные цели получают меньше урона.

В начале и в конце дает 2 руны.
description_blz.ko_KR:
전방 부채꼴 범위 내의 적에게 룬 마력이 소진될 때까지 1초마다 619의 냉기 피해를 지속적으로 입힙니다. 부가 대상에게는 감소된 피해를 입힙니다.

시작과 종료 시 2개의 룬을 생성합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
每1秒持續對你面前錐形範圍內的敵人造成601點冰霜傷害，直到符能耗盡為止。對次要目標造成較低的傷害。

在開始和結束時產生2個符文。
description_blz.zh_CN:
持续对前方锥形区域内的敌人每1秒造成600点冰霜伤害，直到符文能量耗尽。对次要目标造成较低的伤害。

在开始和结束时产生2个符文。
